Vial of Caution AFS

1 {2/U}, Sacrifice Vial of Caution: Until the start of your next turn, spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast. Activate only as sorcery.
Vial of Choice AFS
U 2/U 2 Artifact Artifact
1 {2/U}, Sacrifice Vial of Choice: Until the start of your next turn, creatures can’t attack you unless their controller pays {1} for each of those creatures. Activate only as sorcery.

Sanctum Reminder AFS
Reminder Reminder
1 Before the game starts, place your sanctum here face down. This is not an ordered deck. You can look at your sanctum at any time. Your sanctum consists of up to seven basics lands and unique nonlands that can start in the sanctum. You may sideboard to add or remove cards from your sanctum as long as they are all unique or are basic lands. 1
